original_text: All the people of the land rejoiced, and the city was calm, because Athaliah had been slain with the sword at the palace.
korean_text: 온 백성이 즐거워하고 온 성이 평온하더라 아달랴를 무리가 왕궁에서 칼로 죽였더라

sentences.original_text: All the people of the land rejoiced
because Athaliah had been slain with the sword
sentences.korean_translation: 아달랴가 궁에서 칼에 맞아 죽었기 때문이라
